title: Proficiency
content:
features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Urban Tracker Feature An expert at navigating the wild within the city, you gain proficiency with the disguise kit and thieves' tools. One of the five Natural Explorer features available at Ranger Lvl 1 Ranger Lvl 1 Musical Instrument Proficiency Feature You know how to play a variety of musical instruments and are able to entertain a crowd with them. Bards get this as a starting feature. Bard Lvl 1

Medium Armor Proficiency

All Classes Lvl 4
